Description:
It's the Perfect Beginning or Enticing Investment
An idyllic north facing, streetfront position and a compact block highlights the attraction of this single-level home offering beautifully spacious proportions ideal as a brilliant foot-in-the-door to a sought-after location, profitable investment or future new home site. Appealing light filled spaces filter through a spotless central kitchen leading off to expansive living and dining zones, tidy bathroom and 4 bedrooms all with built-in robes presenting an enticing basis to completely renovate this home to match today's lifestyle requirements (STCA). Whether from owner occupier or investment considerations, this exciting opportunity is walking distance to train station, Clayton strip shops, schools and Monash Medical Centre.
Insights: 1/1256 Centre Road, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning Modern Elegance! Luxury living!
How good is this superbly presented, quality single storey residence in the best location, boasting very large living areas and exceptional privacy being the rear of only two on the block. With easy access to Clayton Shopping Strip, Community Centre, Clayton train station, Monash Medical Centre, and only minutes away from Monash University, you will not find a better growth location!
As you walk into this architecturally design home, the flowing floor plan will lead you to the elegant open living room with modern open kitchen and separate dining area, three spacious bedrooms, one with built-in-robes, master bedroom with ensuite and walk-in-robes, modern family bathroom with separate laundry room and your very own private courtyard, perfect for entertaining family and friends.
Features: Polished hardwood floors, stainless cooking appliances, split air conditioning, ducted heating system, water tank and pump, remote lock-up garage with access to rear garden and too many features to list!
Last chance to inspect and secure this fantastic property, one of the best residences in the area!
Disclaimer: We have in preparing this document used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained in this document is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements in this document. Prospect purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this document.

Description:
Near New, Private & Perfectly Located
Near new, well designed and immaculately cared for, this townhouse provides easy-care, modern living in a high growth area. Comprising of an open plan family/dining room and a stainless steel equipped kitchen with gas cooktop, stone benches and funky red splashbacks. There are three good sized bedrooms; including the downstairs master with a full ensuite and walk-in robe, along with an upstairs retreat area and central bathroom. Creature comforts include; ducted heating, double glazed windows and sliding door, floating floors in the entertaining areas, carpet in all bedrooms, LED down lights and video intercom. Outside, the remote single lock-up garage provides car security and the private courtyard is a great place to unwind. Conveniently located, Westall train station, Clayton shops and cafes, Monash Medical Centre and University are all close by. An inspection is a must!
Photo ID required at all open for inspections.
Insights: 13 other 3 bedroom unit in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
A UNIQUE FAMILY HOME ADJOINING NAMATJIRA PARK
In a beautiful position with views of the adjoining Namatjira Park, this unique family home has been beautifully built and offers space, flexibility and elegance for the family buyer. Behind manicured hedges and a picket fence, the home has a distinct white brick facade and colonial style front windows to give it instant appeal. Inside, living space is more than generous with a formal lounge and open fire, a dining room with double height ceilings, slate tiled meals and family areas, a rumpus room and a gorgeous renovated kitchen with walk in pantry and stainless appliances including a 900mm free-standing oven. There are 3 large and robed bedrooms including the master that has a retreat area, walk in wardrobe, an ensuite and access to the adjoining study with the best views of the park that could easily serve as a 4th bedroom or nursery. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling and an alarm also feature and outside you find a double remote garage with 2 storage rooms plus a grass free backyard with a paved patio for entertaining. Also opposite St Andrews Primary School and buses the home is within minutes of Clarinda Shopping Centre too.
Insights: 39 Springs Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2013 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Corner Block Investment in Prime Location!
Situated in Clayton South's most desirable location on the corner of Centre and Springs Road, this great property presents endless opportunities for future development of townhouses or apartments (STCA). Other options include a conversion into a medical centre, childcare or other like businesses (STCA). The existing family home is within walking distance to all amenities, is well kept and full of character. Featuring formal entrance opening to lounge/dining with an inviting open fire place and gorgeous bay window. Large kitchen/ meals, 4 double bedrooms, master with ensuite and open fire place, study, family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry, carport and plenty of space to park several cars in the driveway. All this on a corner block of 620sqm approx and within minutes away from Clayton train station, shops, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and easy access to Monash Freeway.
This property has massive potential to be an investment of a life time!
Insights: 1242A Centre Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2013 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Position, prospects and potential
A generous allotment enhanced by a preferred northern backdrop and attractive proximity to Keeley Reserve, Clayton shops and Monash Medical Centre complements this classically comfortable c1950s 2 bedroom home. Original spaces offer inviting lounge, functional kitchen, separate dining/3rd bedroom, large family room and spotless bathroom, creating a rewarding context for a full scale renovation/extension to meet contemporary lifestyle priorities. Alternately the deep garden dimensions promise flexibility whether it be applied to a new family home or multi-unit development (STCA). Land: 675sqm (15.24m x 44.35m) approx.
Moses Sawiris : 0421 485 627

Contemporary and Enviably Located!
This modern and pristine townhouse enjoys an ultra-convenient location in a quiet, secluded family estate directly across from Botanic Drive Reserve and just a short stroll to Westall Station and shopping strip, Clayton Business Park, local schools, plus Monash Medical, University and Freeway are close by. Featuring a luxurious, open plan layout comprising a spacious living and dining area, highlighted by high ceilings and gleaming floorboards. A stylish and sophisticated kitchen is perfectly equipped with waterfall stone benchtops and stainless-steel appliances. Additionally, three robed bedrooms, master with ensuite, central heating & cooling and remote double garage complete.

Description:
Beautiful family home in a quiet court with massive land
Superbly presented spacious home positioned in a quiet court with space & comfort on a 800SQM land (approx).
Comprising of 4 bedrooms, formal lounge separate dining area, cinema room, family room, ensuite, modern timber kitchen, plenty of natural light, GDH, cooling, polished floors, SLUG & carport, external spa surrounded by gorgeous manicured gardens ith a huge alfresco & BBQ area with bungalow and solar panels for efficiency.
Potential development opportunities include the construction of 3 townhouses (STCA) or enjoy a luxurious & large family home. Whatever you decide, opportunities such as this in a quiet court location are often hard to find. An inspection will impress you!
Anna Mastrogiannis : 0416 235 329

Description:
AUCTION THIS SAT 16TH NOV AT 3PM
*OFFERS WELCOME PRIOR TO AUCTION... Central to everything within close proximity of Princes Hwy and Monash Freeway access and only 30min from Melbourne CBD and 15min from Dandenong is this prime opportunity to run your business in a security gated complex with on-site front parking or an ideal investment with a fantastic potential return!
Ground floor comprises of a complete warehouse with a container height roller door and full separate storage section ideal for a mechanic, panel beater, photographer and all other trades. Main door access through to the open area which is currently used as a board room however can easily be used to service the retail sector of your business by either turning it into an office with reception and a full flowing show room for display.
Upstairs features the admin sector with an open area for desks and a separate office room. Also consists of kitchenette areas and a shower! Other inclusions are air conditioning and alarm system.
This modern and young building has it all, the storage, the showroom and the offices, what more do you need to help your business grow! Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity as in this area they definitely don't come up to often, contact us today!

Description:
A great renovation or development opportunity (STCA)
There is plenty of potential in this weatherboard home with a large garage/workshop and separate bungalow, but for many it will be all about the land and what can be done with it.
Currently tenanted and offering instant income, the home could easily be renovated with existing features including a spacious lounge room, extended family room at the rear and a central kitchen with gas oven/stove and an adjoining meals area. All 3 bedrooms feature built in wardrobes and there is also a family bathroom, a second shower room and toilet for added convenience. Ducted heating is also included and outside you find a generous garage/workshop with room for up to 3 cars and a partitioned office area as well as a separate bungalow or storage area. But with around 771sqm of flat land, there is certainly development potential here with either a luxurious new family home or up to 3 units possible (STCA). The location will be popular too with buses at the end of the street, Westall primary and secondary schools around the corner while Westall train station and Rosebank Avenue shops within walking distance.
Be Tran : 0434 678 818

Description:
Viva La Villa!
Nesters and investors get out your cheque book because this two-bedroom villa represents value-added buying! Factor in the peaceful location, and that there are only three residences on the block, and that it's low maintenance living here, and that the home has a flowing floorplan plus a private, paved courtyard at the rear. See how the advantages add up! Note the relaxing living room, the eat-in kitchen, the built-in wardrobes in the bedrooms, the separate laundry, the carport... Best of all you can walk to the train station from here; reserves, shops, recreation and schools are nearby; Monash Medical Centre is in handy distance; and Monash University is easily accessed. The villa might benefit from a little TLC - but there's no need to rush. Meanwhile live in or let out - and count the benefits.
Anna Mastrogiannis : 0416 235 329

Wine and Dine Under the Stars!
Situated in this family friendly and quiet cul-de-sac, only minutes away from Clarinda Shopping Centre, St Andrews School and public transport.
This well maintained home comprises of: 3 bedrooms, fully tiled bathroom, practical kitchen with tiled casual meals area and a stunning family/entertaining room with conservatory dining.
Includes: Stainless steel kitchen appliances, floating timber flooring, spa bath, heating and cooling. Double carport with undercover entry compliments the home.
An ideal family home that will appeal to both the home buyer and investor and of course the romantics that like to dance and dine the night away, under the stars!
Alex Vouladas: 0419 385 359
Jim Raccosta: 0418 563 590

Description:
SPACIOUS SINGLE STOREY UNIT
Ideally located near parks, school, and Clayton Shopping Centre. This 3 bedroom unit will suit purchasers that are seeking a spacious and neat property. Comprising of 3 bedrooms with BIR, master with ensuite, large lounge, spacious kitchen and meals, tiled bathroom with sep bath, sep laundry and garage. The backyard will please any gardener seeking space to plant or even establish a veggie patch. . This property is rear unit positioned in a quiet tree lined street, ideal for buyers that require private surroundings. Try the modern swimming facilities at the Clayton Community Centre or take a walk and enjoy the atmosphere at Namatjira park .

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Sale by Set Date 12/11/2013
Located in the popular & quiet pocket of Clayton South on allotment of 600sqm (approx).
Presenting the ultimate in harmonious living, this magnificent family home is a true find with extended entertaining areas will provide lifestyle and accommodation for your family for years to come.
Quick access to the Clayton, Clarinda and Moorabbin area, Westall train station, bus stop, Westall secondary & primary school, Spring Valley golf club, Heatherton Park, Spring Parks Primary School, Springvale Plaza, Aldi supermarket with further easy access to Doctor Surgeries, Dentists, Springvale shopping complex, Library, Railway Station, Springvale Rise & St.Josephs Schools, Killester College, Childcare and all other amenities.
Offering a brilliant home with quality fittings & fixtures, 4 good sized bedrooms with built in robes, master bedroom with walk in robes, en suite, formal lounge, 2 living areas, huge rumpus, updated kitchen with dining area, 2 bathrooms & toilets, separate storage area, stunning timber floor boards throughout, ducted heating, cooling system plus there are plenty of down lights & skylights, satellite dish, beautiful gardens surround the property featuring a pergola with BBQ & big outdoor entertainment area, garden shed.
Lee Phuong : 0402 660 880

Description:
Perfect accommodation for large family or great investment opportunity!
With a homely feel, this residence will create a perfect abode for a large family who are looking to be positioned in the heart of Clayton and close to amenities such as Monash University, Medical Centre, train stations, and potentially the M1 freeway.
This 2 storey weatherboard home has an abundance of living space, is spacious and includes 6 bedrooms with built in robes, two bathrooms, two toilets, laundry, kitchen/meals area with gas cooking.
Features included in the home are: polished floorboards throughout the downstairs, ducted heating, air conditioning, balcony with a view, swimming pool, garage and three extra driveway car spaces.
The opportunity also exists to re-develop opportunity the 710sqm of land for 2 townhouses or keep the existing front and build a new large townhouse at the back (S.T.C.A).
